title: Gasoline price per liter in selected countries - December 2019
yAxis: Price per liter in U.S. dollars
summary: In 2019 , the diesel price per liter in the united states stood at 0.807 u.s. dollars per liter . In the united kingdom in the same month , the price stood at 1.704 u.s. dollars per liter . This data concerns the price of automotive diesel ( for non-commercial use ) per liter in selected countries .
